attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, to call a general election amid the catastrophic failure of the Labour Party to uphold the basic structure of Government in the United Kingdom.

I, for one, wish to welcome a competent political party into power so they can begin to rectify the damage left by the Labour Party over the past 12 years.

The next UK General Election has to take place on, or before, the 3rd of June 2010, but I believe that 1 more year of Labour would result in more damage to our nation as a whole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
